name: $TRUMP MEME Token
description: The Official Trump token, also known as TRUMP, is a meme token launched by President-elect Donald Trump on his Truth Social account. It is a Solana meme coin that allows users to trade and invest in it.
relation: Trump's official meme coin launched on Solana before inaguration

name: $TRUMP SWAP
description: Swap any asset on any Chain into $TRUMP + $MELIAN & vice versa
relation: Reskinned version of NEAR Intents that let you swap any asset on any Chain into $TRUMP + $MELIAN & vice versa

name: World Liberty Financial
relation: TRUMP's DeFi project that resembles an Aave fork.

name: $MELANIA MEME
description: Melania memes are digital collectibles intended to function as an expression of support for and engagement with the values embodied by the symbol MELANIA
relation: First lady's Meme coin launched shortly after $TRUMP launch pre-inaguration

name: Trump Digital Trading Cards
description: A collection of digital trading card NFTs featuring Donald Trump in various heroic poses and costumes, launched on the Polygon blockchain.
relation: Official NFT collection launched by Donald Trump on Polygon

name: USDC
description: Digital dollars backed by 1:1 USD
relation: American backed stablecoin. Issued natively on many chains.

name: Glo Dollar
description: Stablecoin for funding public goods based in America
relation: Based in America. Based on the dolllar backed by doollars. Non profit in America. Funds public goods

name: Ondo Finance
description: Providing 4%+ yeild on US Treasuries (OUSG) and dollars (USDY). Institutional-Grade Finance. Onchain. For Everyone
relation: Providing 4%+ yeild on US Treasuries (OUSG) and dollars (USDY).American backed stablecoin. Issued natively on many chains.

name: Microstrategy
description: MSTR is a pioneer in #AI-powered cloud #analytics, and the largest public holder of $BTC and advocate of #Bitcoin
relation: American market exposure through traditional equities to Bitcoin

name: President DAO
description: President DAO will nominate a member to run in the 2028 US Presidential Election.

name: Holonym.id
description: Proof of address and identity with ZK SBT
relation: Worked with Andrew Yang, President DAO and others to provide proof of american for voters

name: Endaoment
description: The smartest way to give, entirely on-chain âœ¦ Start a DAF for free and support your favorite nonprofits with crypto, cash, or stock
relation: Allows any citizen to get tax write offs through Endaoments and 501c3 donations.

name: Robinhood Crypto
description: Robinhood Crypto offers cryptocurrency trading and transfers, enabling users to trade Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other digital assets with no commission fees. It aims to provide an accessible and user-friendly platform for crypto investors.
relation: A platform expanding access to cryptocurrency trading and DeFi services.

name: BlackRock BUIDL Fund
description: BlackRock's tokenized Treasury fund, BUIDL, offers stable value through investments in U.S. Treasury bills and cash. It provides daily accrued dividends and operates on multiple blockchains, including Ethereum and Polygon.
relation: Largest tokenized Treasury fund globally, integrating traditional finance with blockchain.

name: Tether (USDT)
description: Tether (USDT) is a stablecoin pegged to the US dollar at a 1:1 ratio. It aims to provide stability in the volatile cryptocurrency market by maintaining a constant value relative to the USD.
relation: One of the most widely used stablecoins in the cryptocurrency ecosystem

name: PayPal USD (PYUSD)
description: PayPal USD (PYUSD) is a stablecoin issued by Paxos Trust Company and designed for payments. It is backed 1:1 by US dollars and available on Ethereum and Solana blockchains.
relation: PayPal's official stablecoin, aiming to bridge traditional finance with crypto

name: $FOBXX - Franklin OnChain U.S. Government Money Fund
description: $FOBXX is a regulated mutual fund tokenized on the Stellar blockchain, investing in government securities to provide stable yields while leveraging blockchain for transparency.

name: Ethena USDe
description: USDe is a synthetic dollar stablecoin issued by Ethena Labs, maintaining its peg through delta-neutral hedging strategies using ETH collateral and perpetual futures.
relation: Innovative synthetic stablecoin using delta-neutral strategies

name: DAI
description: DAI is a decentralized, crypto-collateralized stablecoin maintained by MakerDAO, pegged to the US dollar through a system of smart contracts and collateralized debt positions.
relation: One of the first and most widely used decentralized stablecoins

name: First Digital USD (FDUSD)
description: FDUSD is a fully-backed stablecoin issued by First Digital Labs, designed to maintain a 1:1 peg with the US dollar through reserves of cash and cash equivalents.
relation: Emerging stablecoin with growing adoption, particularly on Binance

name: Arca Labs ArCoin
description: ArCoin represents shares in the Arca U.S. Treasury Fund, a SEC-registered fund investing primarily in U.S. Treasury securities, issued as digital asset securities on the Ethereum blockchain.
relation: First SEC-registered fund to issue shares as digital securities

name: Melania's Vision
description: An NFT collection launched by Melania Trump on the Solana blockchain, featuring digital artwork and collectibles related to her time as First Lady.
relation: Official NFT collection launched by Melania Trump on Solana

name: WisdomTree Digital Funds
description: WisdomTree offers a range of blockchain-enabled funds, including the Short-Term Treasury Digital Fund (WTSYX) and Long-Term Treasury Digital Fund (WTLGX), providing exposure to U.S. Treasury securities in a tokenized format.
relation: Traditional asset manager offering blockchain-enabled funds

name: Blockchain Association
description: The Blockchain Association is a collective voice for the cryptocurrency industry, representing leading investors, companies, and projects to advocate for pro-innovation policies and regulatory frameworks.
relation: Leading industry association advocating for favorable crypto policies in the US

name: Coin Center
description: Coin Center is a non-profit research and advocacy center focused on the public policy issues facing cryptocurrency and decentralized computing technologies like Bitcoin and Ethereum.
relation: Leading think tank and advocacy group for cryptocurrency policy issues

name: DeFi Education Fund
description: The DeFi Education Fund is a non-profit organization that explains decentralized finance to policymakers worldwide and advocates for policies welcoming decentralized financial infrastructure.
relation: Advocacy group focused on educating policymakers about DeFi and promoting favorable regulations

name: Circle
description: Circle is a global financial technology firm that enables businesses of all sizes to harness the power of digital currencies and public blockchains for payments, commerce and financial applications worldwide. It is the issuer of USD Coin (USDC), one of the largest stablecoins by market capitalization.
relation: Major player in stablecoin market, advancing crypto adoption in traditional finance

name: Kraken
description: Kraken is one of the largest and oldest cryptocurrency exchanges in the world. It offers trading of cryptocurrencies and derivatives with crypto and fiat pairs, and provides secure storage for digital assets.
relation: Major U.S.-based crypto exchange advancing market accessibility and liquidity

name: Anchorage Digital
description: Anchorage Digital is the first federally chartered digital asset bank in the U.S. It provides institutional investors with custody, trading, and lending services for digital assets.
relation: Bridging traditional finance and crypto through regulated banking services

name: Chainalysis
description: Chainalysis is a blockchain data platform that provides data, software, services, and research to government agencies, exchanges, financial institutions, and insurance and cybersecurity companies.
relation: Enhancing transparency and compliance in the crypto ecosystem

name: Figure
description: Figure is a fintech company leveraging blockchain, AI, and analytics to deliver innovative home equity release solutions, mortgage refinancing, and other financial services.
relation: Applying blockchain technology to transform traditional financial services

name: TaxBit
description: TaxBit is a tax and accounting software provider for the digital economy, helping consumers, businesses, and governments with crypto tax calculations, accounting, and regulatory compliance.
relation: Simplifying crypto tax compliance and reporting for individuals and institutions

name: Bank of America
description: Bank of America is one of the largest banks in the US, offering a range of financial services including some crypto-related offerings.
relation: Permits customers to interact with crypto platforms using credit or debit cards, offers institutional clients Bitcoin futures trading, and provides wealth management clients access to spot Bitcoin ETFs

name: Ally Bank
description: Ally Bank is an online bank that offers various financial services, including some crypto-friendly features.
relation: Connects with Coinbase for crypto trading, allows storage of crypto assets, offers crypto stock investments and access to crypto-based ETFs

name: U.S. Bank
description: U.S. Bank is a major American bank that has begun offering some crypto-related services.
relation: Offers digital asset custody services for institutional investors, allows transactions with major cryptocurrency exchanges using bank cards

name: BNY Mellon
description: BNY Mellon is a major American investment bank and financial services company that has entered the crypto custody space.
relation: Provides institutional crypto custody services, including for Bitcoin and Ethereum, as part of its core business activities

name: JPMorgan Chase
description: JPMorgan Chase is one of the largest banks in the US, offering various financial services including some crypto-related offerings.
relation: Offers blockchain-based services and has developed its own digital coin for institutional clients

name: Fidelity
description: Fidelity is a multinational financial services corporation that has embraced cryptocurrency services.
relation: Offers cryptocurrency custody and trading services for institutional investors, and provides retail customers access to crypto investment products

name: PayPal
description: PayPal is a digital payment company that has integrated cryptocurrency services into its platform.
relation: Allows users to buy, sell, and hold cryptocurrencies, and has launched its own stablecoin (PYUSD) for payments and transfers

name: GIVETH
description: Zero-fee crypto donation platform that rewards donors to verified public goods projects. Donate to a verified project & get rewarded.
relation: Can do donations in $TRUMP on Solana. Also American founder.

name: Koinly
description: Koinly is a comprehensive crypto tax software that supports over 23,000 cryptocurrencies, 170 blockchains, and 400 exchanges. It offers portfolio tracking and tax optimization features.
relation: Simplifying crypto tax reporting and portfolio management for US users

name: CoinLedger
description: CoinLedger offers easy crypto tax calculation and integrates with TurboTax. It supports multiple exchanges and wallets, providing comprehensive tax reports.
relation: Streamlining crypto tax reporting for US taxpayers with TurboTax integration

name: ZenLedger
description: ZenLedger is a user-friendly platform for calculating cryptocurrency, DeFi, and NFT-related taxes. It integrates seamlessly with TurboTax and supports multiple exchanges and blockchains.
relation: Providing comprehensive crypto tax solutions for US users, including DeFi and NFT support

name: TokenTax
description: TokenTax is a crypto tax software and full-service accounting firm offering advanced reconciliation services from crypto-savvy tax professionals.
relation: Offering comprehensive crypto tax services and professional accounting support for US crypto investors

name: Givepact
description: Givepact is a platform that enables cryptocurrency donations to US nonprofits, supporting over 30 cryptocurrencies and facilitating direct donations to any 501(c)(3) organization.
relation: Facilitating crypto donations to US nonprofits and providing potential tax benefits for donors
